title: The Bastards Who Killed Pat Tillman
itunes:title: The Bastards Who Killed Pat Tillman
description:
Robert is joined by Joe Kassabian to discuss the death of Pat Tillman.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. http://www.edgeofsports.com/2008-06-02-350/
  2. https://www.democracynow.org/2008/5/22/mary_tillman_mother_of_slain_nfl
  3. https://www.c-span.org/video/?200236-1/army-ranger-tillman-death-investigation
  4. https://theintercept.com/2017/09/28/pat-tillman-nfl-protest-death-army-disgrace/
  5. https://www.npr.org/sections/thetwo-way/2014/04/22/305969203/soldier-speaks-up-a-decade-after-pat-tillmans-friendly-fire-death
  6. https://www.theguardian.com/world/2010/oct/22/american-troops-friendly-fire-iraq
  7. http://espn.go.com/espn/otl/story/_/id/10791530/ex-army-ranger-speaks-first-former-nfl-player-pat-tillman-shooting-says-fired-fatal-shots
  8. https://www.amazon.com/dp/B002L6HE3W/ref=dp-kindle-redirect?_encoding=UTF8&btkr=1
